name: PageOne
author: United Software Technologies Corporation

sections.description:
PageOne is a platform for creating blog posts, images, meta descriptions, and focus key phrases.

PageOne gives you the ability to create blogs with ease while also creating images for those blog posts. Once you have that created you can move over to meta description and focus key phrase and let our software create that for you to. All you need to do is give it some keywords or find the page you want to crawl and sit back and let us do all the heavy lifting.

Features:

  1. Create Blog posts with just a few keywords or use our keyword research tool to add keywords to make blogging easier
  2. When creating a blog, have the option to generate an image, we currently offer 4 options for types of images, or you can choose not to make one for that post and use your own.
  3. Generate meta descriptions and focus key phrases for Yoast SEO by just selecting the post that you want to crawl.
  4. Look for similar keywords for your website with our keyword research tool, allowing you to save keywords for future use.
  5. Make images to use anywhere on your site, with a just a sentence. Wait for our tool to generate it for you and in a few minutes, you can use the image on any page you want.
  6. Track your websites rankings easily with our rank tracking tool, just connect your Google account and start tracking your websites performance.

Free Version

With the free version you can go into the settings of our plugin and click the generate license button to create a free license to use PageOne, if you want to upgrade to a paid license, you will
be given a brand-new license key and access token to use.

Free Version Features:

  1. Create 3 blog posts a month, each with an image if you choose.
  2. Crawl 3 pages to generate a meta description and focus key phrases for Yoast.
  3. Generate up to 3 images a month to use anywhere on your site.
  4. PageOne branding on the end of blogs

Paid Versions

PageOne Individual Features:

  1. Create 16 blog posts a month, each with an image if you choose.
  2. Crawl 20 pages to generate a meta description and focus key phrases for Yoast.
  3. Generate up to 16 images a month to use anywhere on your site.
  4. Find keywords Similar to keywords you want to write blogs for and save up to 125 keywords and search 150 times a day
  5. See saved keywords on blog generation to make adding keywords easier and faster.
  6. Rank tracking up to 125 keywords
  7. Business Hour Phone & Email Support
  8. Updates to all new features
  9. No PageOne branding

PageOne Business Features:

  1. Create 25 blog posts a month, each with an image if you choose.
  2. Crawl 40 pages to generate a meta description and focus key phrases for Yoast.
  3. Generate up to 25 images a month to use anywhere on your site.
  4. Find keywords Similar to keywords you want to write blogs for and save up to 150 keywords and search 300 times a day
  5. See saved keywords on blog generation to make adding keywords easier and faster.
  6. Rank tracking up to 150 keywords
  7. Business Hour Phone & Email Support
  8. Updates to all new features
  9. No PageOne branding

PageOne Enterprise Features:

  1. Create 35 blog posts a month, each with an image if you choose.
  2. Crawl 60 pages to generate a meta description and focus key phrases for Yoast.
  3. Generate up to 35 images a month to use anywhere on your site.
  4. Find keywords Similar300 to keywords you want to write blogs for and save up to 300 keywords and search 900 times a day
  5. See saved keywords on blog generation to make adding keywords easier and faster.
  6. Rank tracking up to 300 keywords
  7. Business Hour Phone & Email Support
  8. Updates to all new features
  9. No PageOne branding
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->PageOne screen to configure the plugin
  4. Once in the settings use the license key and access token that you can get from our website: https://unitedsoftwaretech.com/pageone
sections.changelog:
3.0.2 3/26/2024

  1. Updated to be compatible with WordPress 6.5

3.0.1 – 3/20/2024

  1. Fixed an issue with fonts being changed else where in the site when it should have just impacted the table in our software.

3.0.0 – 3/18/2024

  1. Fix some bugs that were impacting performance
  2. Added a new feature called rank tracking allowing you to track your sites ranking accross google in order to better understand rankings (this is a premium feature)

2.2.0 – 3/05/2024

  1. Fixed bug on meta description page where on mobile the search bar was way to small.
  2. Added checks for backend code to make sure everything functions correctly.
  3. Added new feature of scheduling a post rather than waiting to publish or schedule once the post it done, making it easier to set and forget. If you don’t set a schedule it defaults to a draft and you will have to publish yourself.
  4. Updated AI to make it even better at creating posts.

2.1.1 – 3/05/2024

  1. Made small bug changes

2.1.0 – 8/08/2023

  1. Made small bug fixes for display issues.
  2. Made changes on API code for new features and fixed bugs.
  3. Update app to work with new WordPress version

2.0.2 – 6/15/2023

  1. Fixed issues with activating plugin

2.0.1 – 6/9/2023

  1. Fixed a bug that was preventing users from creating meta descriptions and focus key phrases.

2.0.0 – 6/8/2023

  1. Added new feature called keyword research, allowing users to find similar keywords and get the monthly volume and SEO difficulty.

  2. Added a new tab for generating images, this now isn’t directly connected to the blog posts, and you can prompt it to create any image for you.

  3. Changed how keywords are put into the text box

  4. Small changes to make the application better and more user friendly.

short_description: PageOne is a platform for creating blog posts, images, meta descriptions, and focus key phrases. PageOne also offers keyword research.
